Services

    Small Animals

    Surgery, dental, neutering, vaccination, microchipping, and more

    Large Animals

    Consultations, on-farm visits, TB testing, and more

    Equine

    Pre-purchase vetting, ultrasounds, x-rays, blood tests, reproduction services, and more

    Large Animal Services

    We offer a plethora of services delivered by our expert staff

    Call-outs & 24hr emergency service

    We provide 24hr emergency service for all registered large animal clients.

    Bovine scanning

    We offer bovine scanning for pregnancy checks, ensuring the health and productivity of your herd. Our advanced ultrasound technology allows for early and accurate detection of pregnancy, helping you manage your breeding programs effectively.

    TB testing

    We offer T.B testing service to our large animal clients. Our experienced veterinarians will conduct thorough testing and offer expert guidance to help maintain the well-being of your livestock.

    Dehoring/Debudding

    We offer safe and humane debudding and dehorning services for cattle. These procedures reduce the risk of injury and improve overall herd management.

    Herd health

    Optimise your herd’s health with our specialised veterinary services, including disease prevention & vaccinations, fertility management, nutritional planning, and routine health assessments. Our team is committed to the well-being and productivity of your herd.

    In-house biochemistry & haematology

    Our clinic offers in-house biochemistry and haematology bloodwork. These advanced tests allow us to assess your animal’s organ function, detect infections, and monitor overall health, allowing us to provide immediate and effective care with the latest diagnostic technology.

    Calvings

    We offer assisted calvings, as well as caesareans for our our registered large animal clients.

    Calf health & management

    Ensure your cales’ health and vitality with our comprehensive veterinary services, including preventative care, vaccinations, nutritional guidance and emergency care. Our team is dedicated to supporting optimal growth and well-being.
